summary: Request to implement custom slot suppliers in the Ruby SDK, similar to the existing Python implementation. This feature would allow users to provide custom logic for managing worker slot allocation.
userImpact: Users can customize slot supplier behavior to implement specialized resource allocation strategies for their workers.
proposedFix: Implement custom slot suppliers following the pattern established in the Python SDK (PR #690)
resolutionDetails: Feature was implemented with comprehensive tests to verify slot info fields
keyQuote: Support custom slot suppliers, e.g. like Python did
